modName: ExE Boss's Mod - Dwemer Restoration Project - Nchuad-Zel
summary: Restore Nchuad-Zel, Markarth and Understone Keep to it's former glory.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][/size][color=#6d9eeb][size=6]ExE Boss's Mod[/size][/color]
[size=5]Dwemer Restoration Project:
[color=#6aa84f]Nchuad-Zel[/color][/size][/center]
This mod will allow you to restore Nchuad-Zel, Markarth and Understone Keep to it's former glory.

[size=5]Installation[/size]
[list=1][*][size=4]READ THE DESCRIPTION[/size][/*]
[*]Download this mod
[/*]
[*]Install this mod
[/*]
[*]Play with the mod[/*]
[/list][size=5]Uninstallation
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]DON'T UNINSTALL UNLESS YOU ABSOLUTELY HAVE TO[/b][/size][/color]
And even then, it's probably better to just start a new game
